error.message: Call to deprecated function entity_get_form_display(). Deprecated in drupal:8.8.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use EntityDisplayRepositoryInterface::getFormDisplay() instead.

Usage of deprecated trait Drupal\Core\Routing\LinkGeneratorTrait in class Drupal\points\PointListBuilder. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Link instead.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to points.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
